abstract: Chelsee Pengal Modern Love column describes her attempts to get her new boyfriend to throw out items he had kept from a previous relationship.
snippet: The Eeyore slippers, looking innocent enough, held the secret of happiness.
lead_paragraph: The Eeyore slippers, looking innocent enough, held the secret of happiness.

headline.main: Fuzzy, Purple and Full of Thorns
